activities.name: Copy A File

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  [MessageID]
	 , [Direction]
      ,[SiteCode]
      ,[MessageDate]
      ,[MessageType]
      ,[CreatedOn]
      ,[Exported]
      ,[ExportedOn]
      ,[LastUpdatedOn]
      ,[FileData]
      ,[FileName]
      ,[BCMessageID]
  FROM [dbo].[DEX_Interface_Document]
  WHERE Exported =  0
		AND InterfaceCode IN ('IBEDISC')

requestBody.value:
@{concat('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
    <soap:Body>
        <CreateMessage xmlns="urn:microsoft-dynamics-schemas/codeunit/MessageMgmt">
            <xMLData>
                <MessageAcknowledgement xmlns="urn:microsoft-dynamics-nav/xmlports/x52000">
                    <Id/>
                    <MessageType>',

            item().MessageType 
,'</MessageType>
                    <Direction>Inbound</Direction>
                    <Payload>
                        <![CDATA[ ',

            item().FileData 
,'
                           ]]>
					
                    </Payload>
                    <Status>Unprocessed</Status>
                    <ExternalRefID>
                    <![CDATA[ ',

            item().MessageID
,'
                           ]]> 
                   </ExternalRefID>
                  <SiteCode>
                  <![CDATA[ ',

            item().SiteCode
,'
                           ]]> 
               </SiteCode>
                </MessageAcknowledgement>
            </xMLData>
        </CreateMessage>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM DEX_Oauth_Access_Token

SELECT  [MessageID]
	 , [Direction]
      ,[SiteCode]
      ,[MessageDate]
      ,[MessageType]
      ,[CreatedOn]
      ,[Exported]
      ,[ExportedOn]
      ,[LastUpdatedOn]
      ,replace([FileDataCsv],'','') AS FileDataCsv
      ,[FileName]
      ,[BCMessageID]
  FROM [dbo].[DEX_Interface_Document]
  WHERE Exported =  0
		AND InterfaceCode IN ('IBILGDC', 'IBILGPOC')

requestBody.value:
@{concat('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
    <soap:Body>
        <CreateMessage xmlns="urn:microsoft-dynamics-schemas/codeunit/MessageMgmt">
            <xMLData>
                <MessageAcknowledgement xmlns="urn:microsoft-dynamics-nav/xmlports/x52000">
                    <Id/>
                    <MessageType>',

            item().MessageType 
,'</MessageType>
                    <Direction>Inbound</Direction>
                    <Payload>
                        <![CDATA[ ',

            item().FileDataCsv 
,'
                           ]]>
					
                    </Payload>
                    <Status>Unprocessed</Status>
                    <ExternalRefID>
                    <![CDATA[ ',

            item().MessageID
,'
                           ]]> 
                   </ExternalRefID>
                  <SiteCode>
                  <![CDATA[ ',

            item().SiteCode
,'
                           ]]> 
               </SiteCode>
                </MessageAcknowledgement>
            </xMLData>
        </CreateMessage>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>')}

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM DEX_Oauth_Access_Token

SELECT [MessageID]
	 , [Direction]
      ,[SiteCode]
      ,[MessageDate]
      ,[MessageType]
      ,[CreatedOn]
      ,[Exported]
      ,[ExportedOn]
      ,[LastUpdatedOn]
      ,[FileData]
      ,[FileName]
      ,[BCMessageID]
  FROM [dbo].[DEX_Interface_Document]
  WHERE  Exported = 0
  AND InterfaceCode IN ('IBPDRINV', 'IBPDRSHIP','IBWCSO')

requestBody.value:
@{concat('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
    <soap:Body>
        <CreateMessage xmlns="urn:microsoft-dynamics-schemas/codeunit/MessageMgmt">
            <xMLData>
                <MessageAcknowledgement xmlns="urn:microsoft-dynamics-nav/xmlports/x52000">
                    <Id/>
                    <MessageType>',

            item().MessageType 
,'</MessageType>
                    <Direction>Inbound</Direction>
                    <Payload>
                        <![CDATA[ ',

            item().FileData 
,'
                           ]]>
					
                    </Payload>
                    <Status>Unprocessed</Status>
                    <ExternalRefID>
                    <![CDATA[ ',

            item().MessageID
,'
                           ]]> 
                   </ExternalRefID>
                  <SiteCode>
                  <![CDATA[ ',

            item().SiteCode
,'
                           ]]> 
               </SiteCode>
                </MessageAcknowledgement>
            </xMLData>
        </CreateMessage>
    </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>')}

SELECT SiteCode,MessageID,BCMessageID  
FROM [dbo].[DEX_Interface_Document] 
WHERE ISNULL([ConfirmationSentToBC],0) = 0 
	  AND InterfaceCode IN ('OBWCINV','OBWCORDCON','OBWCSHIP')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT SiteCode,MessageID,BCMessageID, InterfaceCode  
FROM [dbo].[DEX_Interface_Document] 
WHERE ISNULL([ConfirmationSentToBC],0) = 0 
AND InterfaceCode IN ('OBILGSO','OBILGPO','OBILGMD')

dependsOn.activity: Get Doc List To Confirm ILG

SELECT DI.InterfaceCode, DI.[Enabled], DI.[Type], DI.[Direction], DI.[FTPDropDir], DI.FTPProcessedDir 
FROM dbo.DEX_Interface DI
WHERE InterfaceCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.Interface_Code}'

SELECT TOP 1 * FROM dbo.DEX_Site_Config  
 WHERE   SiteCode LIKE'%EU%'

SELECT DI.InterfaceCode, DI.[Enabled], DI.[Type], DI.[Direction], DI.[FTPDropDir], DI.FTPProcessedDir 
FROM dbo.DEX_Interface DI
WHERE InterfaceCode = 'IBEDISCFBL'
